list.name: Brain nipple cross
list.nameTH: Brain nipple cross
list.description:
We created this to promote the healthy growth of babies and the importance of chewing. The Bétta brain nipple promotes healthy chewing habits as the baby's jaws move to make the milk come out. The flexible material means babies can move their upper and lower jaw up and down just like with a mother’s breast. Replacement nipple is 2pcs set.

Cross Cut
For use with newborns and up
The nipple’s hole is cut in a cross-cut shape to encourage mouth movement while feeding.

Material : Silicone
Heatproof temperature : 120°C
Quantity : Two in one box.
list.descriptionTH:
Description

คุณสมบัติของจุกนม BRAIN ( Cross Cut)

    จุกแบบไม่ดูดไม่ไหล น้ำนมจะไหลตามแรงดูดของลูกน้อย
    จุกมีความนิ่ม ปลายจุกกลม ผิวสัมผัสมีความด้านและเป็นรอยหยักช่วงปลายจุก มีความเสมือนนมแม่
    สามารถใช้สลับกับการเข้าเต้าได้
    ช่วยเสริมสร้างพัฒนาการในการดูดและการบดเคี้ยวของลูกน้อย
    สามารถใช้ได้ทุกช่วงวัย เหมาะกับเด็กแรกเกิดไปจนถึงเด็กหย่านม



คุณลักษณะของวัสดุ

จุกนม ทำมาจากซิลิโคน100%

    สีขาวใส
    มีความยืดหยุ่น คงรูป
    ทนความร้อนสูงสุด 120 องศาเซลเซียส
    เนื่องจากหากจุกผ่านความร้อนบ่อยๆ อาจะทำให้อายุการใช้งานสั้นลงหรือตัวจุกเสื่อมลงได้ ทางเราแนะนำให้เปลี่ยนทุกๆ2-3เดือนจะดีที่สุด


หมายเหตุ : หากเกิดปัญหาจุกแฟบให้คลายฝาขวดไม่ปิดแน่นจนเกินไปหรือใช้ Heart Pin เจาะที่รูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานเพิ่มช่วยให้อากาศไหลเวียนดียิ่งขึ้น

list.nameTH: Brain nipple round-hole S

Round Hole S

list.name: Jewel nipple cross
list.nameTH: Jewel nipple cross
list.description:
The jewel nipple was inspired by a hope of creating a bottle nipple that would be even more universal, allowing it to accommodate more infants. This bottle is the result of repeated research based on feedback from the mothers that use Bétta's products. The design passed rigorous tests on factors such as the size of the opening, the ideal softness of silicone rubber, how easily the air valve opened, and its tolerance to deforming. The design facilitates your baby's natural instinct to “want to drink. There are 2 replacement bottle nipples in each box.

Cross Cut
For use with six-month olds and up
The nipple’s hole is cut in a cross-cut shape to encourage mouth movement while feeding.

Material : Silicone
Heatproof temperature : 120°C
Quantity : Two in one box.

list.name: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain WS2-240ml (Green)
list.nameTH: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain WS2-240ml (Green)
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.
Doctor Bétta's wide-neck bottles make swallowing easier and reduce coughing and ear strain. This bottle is also easy to wash and fill. The texture mimics a mother’s breast. The wide shape’s stability helps prevent it from spilling, making feeding time even easier.
We created this to promote the healthy growth of babies and the importance of chewing. The Bétta brain nipple promotes healthy chewing habits as the baby's jaws move to make the milk come out. The flexible material means babies can move their upper and lower jaw up and down just like with a mother’s breast. Feature of wide-neck replacement nipple is Exactly like a mother's nipple, and Easy to clean. The nipple’s hole is cut in a cross-cut shape to encourage mouth movement while feeding.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
PPSU bottle : 180°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C
list.descriptionTH:
Description

คุณสมบัติพิเศษของขวดนม Dr.Betta

ขวดนมถูกออกแบบมาให้มีรูปทรงโค้งเพื่อตอบโจทย์การดื่มนมของลูกน้อยได้อย่างดีที่สุด

    ป้องกันโคลิคได้เป็นอย่างดี
    ทำให้ลูกน้อยสามารถดื่มนมได้ในท่าที่ถูกต้องหรือท่านั่งตรงเสมือนดูดนมจากเต้ามารดา
    ลูกน้อยสามารถกลืนนมได้ง่ายยิ่งขึ้น
    ลดโอกาสการเกิดโรคหูชั้นกลางอักเสบ อันเนื่องมาจากน้ำนมไหลเข้าสู่หูชั้นกลาง
    ขวดนมถูกออกแบบมาให้มีอากาศในขวดน้อยที่สุด ลดการกลืนลมของลูกน้อย


คุณสมบัติของจุกนม BRAIN ( Cross Cut)

    จุกแบบไม่ดูดไม่ไหล น้ำนมจะไหลตามแรงดูดของลูกน้อย
    จุกมีความนิ่ม ปลายจุกกลม ผิวสัมผัสมีความด้านและเป็นรอยหยัก ช่วงปลายจุกมีความเสมือนนมแม่
    สามารถใช้สลับกับการเข้าเต้าได้
    ช่วยเสริมสร้างพัฒนาการในการดูดและการบดเคี้ยวของลูกน้อย
    สามารถใช้ได้ทุกช่วงวัย เหมาะกับเด็กแรกเกิดไปจนถึงเด็กหย่านม


คุณลักษณะของวัสดุ

ขวดนม ทำมาจากพลาสติก PPSU (สีชา) 

    มีความแข็งแรงทนทานตกไม่แตกไม่ดูดซับสีและกลิ่น 
    ทนความร้อนสูงสุด 180 องศาเซลเซียส
    สามารถนำเข้าเครื่องนึ่งฆ่าเชื้อและเครื่องอบ UV ได้
    อายุการใช้งานสูงสุด 2 ปี


Heart Pin (เข็มรูปหัวใจ) ที่แถมมาในกล่องใช้สำหรับการเจาะรูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานจุกนมเพื่อทำให้อากาศไหลเวียนได้ดียิ่งขึ้น


หมายเหตุ : หากเกิดปัญหาจุกแฟบให้คลายฝาขวดไม่ปิดแน่นจนเกินไปหรือใช้ Heart Pin เจาะที่รูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานเพิ่มช่วยให้อากาศไหลเวียนดียิ่งขึ้น

list.name: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain WS2-240ml (Pink)
list.nameTH: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain WS2-240ml (Pink)
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.
Doctor Bétta's wide-neck bottles make swallowing easier and reduce coughing and ear strain. This bottle is also easy to wash and fill. The texture mimics a mother’s breast. The wide shape’s stability helps prevent it from spilling, making feeding time even easier.
We created this to promote the healthy growth of babies and the importance of chewing. The Bétta brain nipple promotes healthy chewing habits as the baby's jaws move to make the milk come out. The flexible material means babies can move their upper and lower jaw up and down just like with a mother’s breast. Feature of wide-neck replacement nipple is Exactly like a mother's nipple, and Easy to clean. The nipple’s hole is cut in a cross-cut shape to encourage mouth movement while feeding.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
PPSU bottle : 180°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

list.name: Preschool Support Set
list.nameTH: Preschool Support Set
list.description:
Limited quanity　The perfect set before starting preschool.

How about preparing for your baby's first day of preschool? Bétta has prepared a beautiful and functional set of items to help you prepare for your child's first day of preschool, wishing for their healthy growth and happiness as they enter a new stage of life in spring.

Set Contents

Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle Brain WS2-240ml（Pink or Green）
Bétta Silk Towel (Baby Bath)
Bétta Silk Towel Handkerchief (Green)
Warmth Pouch (320ml GIOIA)
Special Offer

Bétta Party Cup×２
Cute Dots Bag
Bétta Premium Gift Box
Store Card ( welcome baby )
Cautions

As this is a set product, we do not accept returns or exchanges.

list.name: Glass 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain GF4-240ml (Flower)
list.nameTH: Glass 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain GF4-240ml (Flower)
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.

The Okuya Glass Factory is a traditional family business based in Downtown Tokyo. One of the two remaining handmade glass workshops in Tokyo, it is the sole official manufacturer of Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles in heat resistant glass. Bétta delicate but efficient curve makes the bottle impossible to mass produce without losing its quality: thus all our baby bottles are hand made, one by one!

"Because all our bottles users are babies", any possibility of some flaw or weakness in a freshly made bottle is treated without the shadow of a doubt: the bottle is trashed. This extreme quality control is one of the many reasons for Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles high quality. These glass baby bottles are all crafted with the utmost care and sincere hope from our craftsmen that every baby will use them for a long time.Our manufacturing requires skill and high spirit, fueled by the need for babies health and parents safety.
Doctors spent many time on research and studying babies health,
before they invent the Bétta baby bottle.
At Bétta. we share that hope and that goal.

240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.

The flower series came into being from our desire for all babies born in this world to receive plenty of love and grow healthily, just like plants that grow strong and healthy, soaking in all in the sunlight that shines down onto them. We also bring you this bottle with the kind of feeling you have offering someone a bouquet of flowers, filled with gratitude for all the people who love our brand—Betta.

Material
Glass bottle : Heat-resistant glass
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
Glass bottle : 120°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

list.name: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain CharmBottle-240ml
list.nameTH: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain CharmBottle-240ml
list.description:
We are releasing the Charm Bottle to bring you good luck in 2021, the year of the ox.

BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.
"Brain nipple" was inspired from the experiences of an actual midwife. It was developed considering the importance of mastication, as well as with a wish for healthy growth for the baby. Once the baby starts sucking it, the secret wavy part stretches out to fit the mouth and tongue! The nipple lets the baby drink while moving their upper and lower jaw, as if they were being breastfed. This [Crosscut] type notch at the tip, which lets the baby squeeze out milk by moving their mouths, allows them to drink on their own pace.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
PPSU bottle : 180°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

Description

คุณสมบัติพิเศษของขวดนม Dr.Betta

ขวดนมถูกออกแบบมาให้มีรูปทรงโค้งเพื่อตอบโจทย์การดื่มนมของลูกน้อยได้อย่างดีที่สุด

    ป้องกันโคลิคได้เป็นอย่างดี
    ทำให้ลูกน้อยสามารถดื่มนมได้ในท่าที่ถูกต้องหรือท่านั่งตรงเสมือนดูดนมจากเต้ามารดา
    ลูกน้อยสามารถกลืนนมได้ง่ายยิ่งขึ้น
    ลดโอกาสการเกิดโรคหูชั้นกลางอักเสบ อันเนื่องมาจากน้ำนมไหลเข้าสู่หูชั้นกลาง
    ขวดนมถูกออกแบบมาให้มีอากาศในขวดน้อยที่สุด ลดการกลืนลมของลูกน้อย


คุณสมบัติของจุกนม BRAIN ( Cross Cut)

    จุกแบบไม่ดูดไม่ไหล น้ำนมจะไหลตามแรงดูดของลูกน้อย
    จุกมีความนิ่ม ปลายจุกกลม ผิวสัมผัสมีความด้านและเป็นรอยหยัก ช่วงปลายจุกมีความเสมือนนมแม่
    สามารถใช้สลับกับการเข้าเต้าได้
    ช่วยเสริมสร้างพัฒนาการในการดูดและการบดเคี้ยวของลูกน้อย
    สามารถใช้ได้ทุกช่วงวัย เหมาะกับเด็กแรกเกิดไปจนถึงเด็กหย่านม


คุณลักษณะของวัสดุ

ขวดนม ทำมาจากพลาสติก PPSU (สีชา) 

    มีความแข็งแรงทนทานตกไม่แตกไม่ดูดซับสีและกลิ่น 
    ทนความร้อนสูงสุด 180 องศาเซลเซียส
    สามารถนำเข้าเครื่องนึ่งฆ่าเชื้อและเครื่องอบ UV ได้
    อายุการใช้งานสูงสุด 2 ปี


Heart Pin (เข็มรูปหัวใจ) ที่แถมมาในกล่องใช้สำหรับการเจาะรูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานจุกนมเพื่อทำให้อากาศไหลเวียนได้ดียิ่งขึ้น


หมายเหตุ : หากเกิดปัญหาจุกแฟบให้คลายฝาขวดไม่ปิดแน่นจนเกินไปหรือใช้ Heart Pin เจาะที่รูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานเพิ่มช่วยให้อากาศไหลเวียนดียิ่งขึ้น

list.name: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain AMULET BOTTLE-240ml
list.nameTH: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain AMULET BOTTLE-240ml
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.
"Brain nipple" was inspired from the experiences of an actual midwife. It was developed considering the importance of mastication, as well as with a wish for healthy growth for the baby. Once the baby starts sucking it, the secret wavy part stretches out to fit the mouth and tongue! The nipple lets the baby drink while moving their upper and lower jaw, as if they were being breastfed. This [Crosscut] type notch at the tip, which lets the baby squeeze out milk by moving their mouths, allows them to drink on their own pace.
The heart represents love and care. We developed the product with the solemn wish for babies to grow up with lots of love, so they can live their lives showing others the ample amount of love they received.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
PPSU bottle : 180°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

list.name: Glass 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain G4-240ml (temari)
list.nameTH: Glass 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain G4-240ml (temari)
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.The Okuya Glass Factory is a traditional family business based in Downtown Tokyo. One of the two remaining handmade glass workshops in Tokyo, it is the sole official manufacturer of Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles in heat resistant glass. Bétta delicate but efficient curve makes the bottle impossible to mass produce without losing its quality: thus all our baby bottles are hand made, one by one!
"Because all our bottles users are babies", any possibility of some flaw or weakness in a freshly made bottle is treated without the shadow of a doubt: the bottle is trashed. This extreme quality control is one of the many reasons for Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles high quality. These glass baby bottles are all crafted with the utmost care and sincere hope from our craftsmen that every baby will use them for a long time.Our manufacturing requires skill and high spirit, fueled by the need for babies health and parents safety.240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.Doctor Bétta baby bottles celebrate their 25 years anniversary this year 2020! With all the celebrations like the Olympic games Bétta decided to illustrate this bottle with the Temari, a traditional symbol from Japan. In ancient times, Japanese mothers used to make a Temari ball toy out of threads to wish upon the health of their baby. Let Japan share this traditional with all the babies and parents around the world! "Brain nipple" was inspired from the experiences of an actual midwife. It was developed considering the importance of mastication, as well as with a wish for healthy growth for the baby. Once the baby starts sucking it, the secret wavy part stretches out to fit the mouth and tongue! The nipple lets the baby drink while moving their upper and lower jaw, as if they were being breastfed. This [Crosscut] type notch at the tip, which lets the baby squeeze out milk by moving their mouths, allows them to drink on their own pace.

Material
Glass bottle : Heat-resistant glass
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
Glass bottle : 120°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

list.nameTH: PP 150ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Jewel P2-150ml
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
Charming milk-colored bottle that leaves a gentle impression. Not only is it light and easy to handle, but also hard to collect visible scratches, which makes it handy when leaving the home. BPA Free.
Size that can be used until the drink a little amount from the newborn. In 240ml and a matching design is a great gift.
We wanted to create nipples that could feel more familiar to the baby's mouth. Born from such thoughts is our Jewel nipples. We collected the feedbacks from mothers who have been using our Betta product, and used them in our repeated research to create this new product. The product has the perfect hole size, silicone rubber softness, ease in opening the air valve, crush resistance, and more. It encourages the babies to drink from it.
The hood is shaped like a piece of jewelry. May the baby’s future shine just like a precious gem sparkling in different angles of light. May it be a future full of dazzling hope. With bright colors and a beautiful design, the bottle was made to brighten the mother’s mood. That was our focus in designing this product.

Material
Polypropylene bottle : Polypropylene
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
Polypropylene bottle : 120°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

    ทำให้ลูกน้อยสามารถดื่มนมได้ในท่าที่ถูกต้องหรือท่านั่งตรง เสมือนดูดนมจากเต้ามารดา
    ลูกน้อยสามารถกลืนนมได้ง่ายยิ่งขึ้น
    ลดโอกาสการเกิดโรคหูชั้นกลางอักเสบอันเนื่องมาจากน้ำนมไหลเข้าสู่หูชั้นกลาง
    ขวดนมถูกออกแบบมาให้มีอากาศในขวดน้อยที่สุด ลดการกลืนลมของลูกน้อย


คุณสมบัติของจุกนม JEWEL (Round Hole)

    จุกนมแบบน้ำนมไหลเองอัตโนมัติ น้ำนมจะค่อยๆหยดออกมาเองช้าๆ
    จุกมีความนิ่ม ปลายจุกเรียวเล็ก ผิวสัมผัสมีความลื่น
    ไม่ต้องใช้แรงดูดเยอะ มีความดูดง่าย
    เหมาะกับเด็กแรกเกิดหรือเด็กที่มีแรงดูดไม่เยอะ


คุณลักษณะของวัสดุ

ขวดนม ทำมาจากพลาสติก PPSU (สีชา) 

    มีความแข็งแรงทนทานตกไม่แตกไม่ดูดซับสีและกลิ่น 
    ทนความร้อนสูงสุด 180 องศาเซลเซียส
    สามารถนำเข้าเครื่องนึ่งฆ่าเชื้อและเครื่องอบ UV ได้
    อายุการใช้งานสูงสุด 2 ปี


Heart Pin (เข็มรูปหัวใจ) ที่แถมมาในกล่องใช้สำหรับการเจาะรูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานจุกนมเพื่อทำให้อากาศไหลเวียนได้ดียิ่งขึ้น


หมายเหตุ : หากเกิดปัญหาจุกแฟบให้คลายฝาขวดไม่ปิดแน่นจนเกินไปหรือใช้ Heart Pin เจาะที่รูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานเพิ่มช่วยให้อากาศไหลเวียนดียิ่งขึ้น

list.name: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Jewel S3-Gingham-240ml
list.nameTH: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Jewel S3-Gingham-240ml
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.
To that image is, of southern Italy trattoria. Tablecloth gingham check. Good smell from the kitchen. Kitchen tools to make a sound to sing. With this kind of lively and bright atmosphere, we aim to bottle such that the pleasant feeling every time you use. Every day irreplaceable of the baby, so that will be something more a more lovely.
We wanted to create nipples that could feel more familiar to the baby's mouth. Born from such thoughts is our Jewel nipples. We collected the feedbacks from mothers who have been using our Betta product, and used them in our repeated research to create this new product. The product has the perfect hole size, silicone rubber softness, ease in opening the air valve, crush resistance, and more. It encourages the babies to drink from it.
The hood is shaped like a piece of jewelry. May the baby’s future shine just like a precious gem sparkling in different angles of light. May it be a future full of dazzling hope. With bright colors and a beautiful design, the bottle was made to brighten the mother’s mood. That was our focus in designing this product.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
PPSU bottle : 180°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

One of the two remaining handmade glass workshops in Tokyo, it is the sole official manufacturer of Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles in heat resistant glass. Bétta delicate but efficient curve makes the bottle impossible to mass produce without losing its quality: thus all our baby bottles are hand made, one by one!
"Because all our bottles users are babies", any possibility of some flaw or weakness in a freshly made bottle is treated without the shadow of a doubt: the bottle is trashed. This extreme quality control is one of the many reasons for Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles high quality. These glass baby bottles are all crafted with the utmost care and sincere hope from our craftsmen that every baby will use them for a long time.Our manufacturing requires skill and high spirit, fueled by the need for babies health and parents safety.

list.name: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Jewel S1-240ml (Purple)
list.nameTH: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Jewel S1-240ml (Purple)
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.
We wanted to create nipples that could feel more familiar to the baby's mouth. Born from such thoughts is our Jewel nipples. We collected the feedbacks from mothers who have been using our Betta product, and used them in our repeated research to create this new product. The product has the perfect hole size, silicone rubber softness, ease in opening the air valve, crush resistance, and more. It encourages the babies to drink from it.
The hood is shaped like a piece of jewelry. May the baby’s future shine just like a precious gem sparkling in different angles of light. May it be a future full of dazzling hope. With bright colors and a beautiful design, the bottle was made to brighten the mother’s mood. That was our focus in designing this product.
The design of the bottle is inspired by the image of a ribbon. Ribbons have long been symbols of ties and bonds, and are also said to be strongly associated with a love of one’s family and children. The ribbon exemplifies a strength to gently envelop the hearts of people in lasting and beautiful ties. It makes for an ideal baby shower gift, or just to use in your own household. The easy-to-use PPSU material is both cost-friendly and accessible.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
PPSU bottle : 180°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

list.nameTH: PPSU 120ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain S3-Tartan-120ml
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
120ml (4 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.
"Brain nipple" was inspired from the experiences of an actual midwife. It was developed considering the importance of mastication, as well as with a wish for healthy growth for the baby. Once the baby starts sucking it, the secret wavy part stretches out to fit the mouth and tongue! The nipple lets the baby drink while moving their upper and lower jaw, as if they were being breastfed. This [Crosscut] type notch at the tip, which lets the baby squeeze out milk by moving their mouths, allows them to drink on their own pace.
The heart represents love and care. We developed the product with the solemn wish for babies to grow up with lots of love, so they can live their lives showing others the ample amount of love they received.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
PPSU bottle : 180°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

    สามารถใช้สลับกับการเข้าเต้าได้
    ช่วยเสริมสร้างพัฒนาการในการดูดและการบดเคี้ยวของลูกน้อย
    สามารถใช้ได้ทุกช่วงวัย เหมาะกับเด็กแรกเกิดไปจนถึงเด็กหย่านม



คุณลักษณะของวัสดุ

ขวดนม ทำมาจากพลาสติก PPSU (สีชา) 

    มีความแข็งแรงทนทานตกไม่แตกไม่ดูดซับสีและกลิ่น 
    ทนความร้อนสูงสุด 180 องศาเซลเซียส
    สามารถนำเข้าเครื่องนึ่งฆ่าเชื้อและเครื่องอบ UV ได้
    อายุการใช้งานสูงสุด 2 ปี


Heart Pin (เข็มรูปหัวใจ) ที่แถมมาในกล่องใช้สำหรับการเจาะรูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานจุกนมเพื่อทำให้อากาศไหลเวียนได้ดียิ่งขึ้น


หมายเหตุ : หากเกิดปัญหาจุกแฟบให้คลายฝาขวดไม่ปิดแน่นจนเกินไปหรือใช้ Heart Pin เจาะที่รูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานเพิ่มช่วยให้อากาศไหลเวียนดียิ่งขึ้น

Nipple : Silicone

list.name: Glass 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain G4-Carrousel-240ml (Blue)
list.nameTH: Glass 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain G4-Carrousel-240ml (Blue)
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
The Okuya Glass Factory is a traditional family business based in Downtown Tokyo. One of the two remaining handmade glass workshops in Tokyo, it is the sole official manufacturer of Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles in heat resistant glass. Bétta delicate but efficient curve makes the bottle impossible to mass produce without losing its quality: thus all our baby bottles are hand made, one by one!
"Because all our bottles users are babies", any possibility of some flaw or weakness in a freshly made bottle is treated without the shadow of a doubt: the bottle is trashed. This extreme quality control is one of the many reasons for Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles high quality. These glass baby bottles are all crafted with the utmost care and sincere hope from our craftsmen that every baby will use them for a long time.Our manufacturing requires skill and high spirit, fueled by the need for babies health and parents safety.
This shape and size is difficult to achieve, even with master Japanese crafting techniques. Only a few per day can be produced. Our thoughts focused on the precious growing babies who use our bottles, early each morning, we craft these bottles by hand, one by one, in our workshop. Our products are unique gems you'll want to keep as mementos even after your baby is all grown up.

Material
Glass bottle : Heat-resistant glass
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
Glass bottle : 120°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C

It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
Dr. Betta's baby bottle began with a small 2 fl oz (about 60 ml) bottle developed by an American pediatrician for newborns.
Doctor Betta 70 ml (2.3 fl oz) baby bottle became available for sale after there were numerous requests to use hospital baby bottles at home.
However, we have increased the capacity to 80 ml (2.6 fl oz) as per customers’ requests, who asked for the bottle to last a little longer, since the smaller bottle would become useless too quickly.
The baby bottle is also highly popular as the first bottle to celebrate the baby’s birth, which can be kept for use later on. In addition, once the baby starts eating baby hood, the bottle can be used as a bottle for drinking tea or hot water.

The nipple lets the baby drink while moving their upper and lower jaw, as if they were being breastfed. This [Crosscut] type notch at the tip, which lets the baby squeeze out milk by moving their mouths, allows them to drink on their own pace.
It is said that stars make dreams come true, so we made the hood of the baby bottle in a star shape, so that your baby's dreams and wishes may come true, as you would wish upon a shooting star.

Nipple : Silicone

    ป้องกันโคลิคได้เป็นอย่างดี
    ทำให้ลูกน้อยสามารถดื่มนมได้ในท่าที่ถูกต้องหรือท่านั่งตรงเสมือนดูดนมจากเต้ามารดา
    ลูกน้อยสามารถกลืนนมได้ง่ายยิ่งขึ้น
    ลดโอกาสการเกิดโรคหูชั้นกลางอักเสบอันเนื่องมาจากน้ำนมไหลเข้าสู่หูชั้นกลาง
    ขวดนมถูกออกแบบมาให้มีอากาศในขวดน้อยที่สุด ลดการกลืนลมของลูกน้อย


คุณสมบัติของจุกนม BRAIN ( Cross Cut)

    จุกแบบไม่ดูดไม่ไหล น้ำนมจะไหลตามแรงดูดของลูกน้อย
    จุกมีความนิ่ม ปลายจุกกลม ผิวสัมผัสมีความด้านและเป็นรอยหยักช่วงปลายจุก มีความเสมือนนมแม่
    สามารถใช้สลับกับการเข้าเต้าได้
    ช่วยเสริมสร้างพัฒนาการในการดูดและการบดเคี้ยวของลูกน้อย
    สามารถใช้ได้ทุกช่วงวัย เหมาะกับเด็กแรกเกิดไปจนถึงเด็กหย่านม



คุณลักษณะของวัสดุ

ขวดนม ทำมาจากพลาสติก PPSU (สีชา) 

    มีความแข็งแรงทนทานตกไม่แตกไม่ดูดซับสีและกลิ่น 
    ทนความร้อนสูงสุด 180 องศาเซลเซียส
    สามารถนำเข้าเครื่องนึ่งฆ่าเชื้อและเครื่องอบ UV ได้
    อายุการใช้งานสูงสุด 2 ปี


Heart Pin (เข็มรูปหัวใจ) ที่แถมมาในกล่องใช้สำหรับการเจาะรูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานจุกนมเพื่อทำให้อากาศไหลเวียนได้ดียิ่งขึ้น


หมายเหตุ : หากเกิดปัญหาจุกแฟบให้คลายฝาขวดไม่ปิดแน่นจนเกินไปหรือใช้ Heart Pin เจาะที่รูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานเพิ่มช่วยให้อากาศไหลเวียนดียิ่งขึ้น

list.name: Glass 80ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain GF4-80ml (Flower)
list.nameTH: Glass 80ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Brain GF4-80ml (Flower)
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.The Okuya Glass Factory is a traditional family business based in Downtown Tokyo. One of the two remaining handmade glass workshops in Tokyo, it is the sole official manufacturer of Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles in heat resistant glass. Bétta delicate but efficient curve makes the bottle impossible to mass produce without losing its quality: thus all our baby bottles are hand made, one by one!
"Because all our bottles users are babies", any possibility of some flaw or weakness in a freshly made bottle is treated without the shadow of a doubt: the bottle is trashed. This extreme quality control is one of the many reasons for Doctor Bétta Baby Bottles high quality. These glass baby bottles are all crafted with the utmost care and sincere hope from our craftsmen that every baby will use them for a long time.Our manufacturing requires skill and high spirit, fueled by the need for babies health and parents safety.
Dr. Betta's baby bottle began with a small 2 fl oz (about 60 ml) bottle developed by an American pediatrician for newborns.
Doctor Betta 70 ml (2.3 fl oz) baby bottle became available for sale after there were numerous requests to use hospital baby bottles at home.
However, we have increased the capacity to 80 ml (2.6 fl oz) as per customers’ requests, who asked for the bottle to last a little longer, since the smaller bottle would become useless too quickly.
The baby bottle is also highly popular as the first bottle to celebrate the baby’s birth, which can be kept for use later on. In addition, once the baby starts eating baby hood, the bottle can be used as a bottle for drinking tea or hot water.
The flower series came into being from our desire for all babies born in this world to receive plenty of love and grow healthily, just like plants that grow strong and healthy, soaking in all in the sunlight that shines down onto them. We also bring you this bottle with the kind of feeling you have offering someone a bouquet of flowers, filled with gratitude for all the people who love our brand—Betta.

Material
Glass bottle : Heat-resistant glass
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature

Nipple : 120°C

This shape and size is difficult to achieve, even with master Japanese crafting techniques. Only a few per day can be produced. Our thoughts focused on the precious growing babies who use our bottles, early each morning, we craft these bottles by hand, one by one, in our workshop. Our products are unique gems you'll want to keep as mementos even after your baby is all grown up.
This design is inspired by buttons. A button adds an accent to clothes and connects shirts' and cardigans' left and right sides. This represents Mom's and Dad's deep care for their baby, shown in the way they button up his or her clothing one button at a time.It comes with a message saying, "Mom's smile is better than anything!" written in French. Just like buttons come in different shapes, there are also different kinds of people. A bright future surely awaits a person raised to accept his or her uniqueness.

list.nameTH: PPSU 240ml Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle / Jewel S1-240ml (Orange)
list.description:
The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
240ml (8 fl oz) bottle that is suited for infants from newborn babies to weaning babies. Even when the baby starts drinking more, it is still very useful to have an 8 fl oz bottle with you.
We wanted to create nipples that could feel more familiar to the baby's mouth. Born from such thoughts is our Jewel nipples. We collected the feedbacks from mothers who have been using our Betta product, and used them in our repeated research to create this new product. The product has the perfect hole size, silicone rubber softness, ease in opening the air valve, crush resistance, and more. It encourages the babies to drink from it.
The hood is shaped like a piece of jewelry. May the baby’s future shine just like a precious gem sparkling in different angles of light. May it be a future full of dazzling hope. With bright colors and a beautiful design, the bottle was made to brighten the mother’s mood. That was our focus in designing this product.
The design of the bottle is inspired by the image of a ribbon. Ribbons have long been symbols of ties and bonds, and are also said to be strongly associated with a love of one’s family and children. The ribbon exemplifies a strength to gently envelop the hearts of people in lasting and beautiful ties. It makes for an ideal baby shower gift, or just to use in your own household. The easy-to-use PPSU material is both cost-friendly and accessible.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
PPSU bottle : 180°C
Cap hood : 120°C
Nipple : 120°C
list.descriptionTH:
Description

คุณสมบัติพิเศษของขวดนม Dr.Betta

ขวดนมถูกออกแบบมาให้มีรูปทรงโค้งเพื่อตอบโจทย์การดื่มนมของลูกน้อยได้อย่างดีที่สุด

    ป้องกันโคลิคได้เป็นอย่างดี
    ทำให้ลูกน้อยสามารถดื่มนมได้ในท่าที่ถูกต้องหรือท่านั่งตรง เสมือนดูดนมจากเต้ามารดา
    ลูกน้อยสามารถกลืนนมได้ง่ายยิ่งขึ้น
    ลดโอกาสการเกิดโรคหูชั้นกลางอักเสบอันเนื่องมาจากน้ำนมไหลเข้าสู่หูชั้นกลาง
    ขวดนมถูกออกแบบมาให้มีอากาศในขวดน้อยที่สุด ลดการกลืนลมของลูกน้อย


คุณสมบัติของจุกนม JEWEL (Round Hole)

    จุกนมแบบน้ำนมไหลเองอัตโนมัติ น้ำนมจะค่อยๆหยดออกมาเองช้าๆ
    จุกมีความนิ่ม ปลายจุกเรียวเล็ก ผิวสัมผัสมีความลื่น
    ไม่ต้องใช้แรงดูดเยอะ มีความดูดง่าย
    เหมาะกับเด็กแรกเกิดหรือเด็กที่มีแรงดูดไม่เยอะ


คุณลักษณะของวัสดุ

ขวดนม ทำมาจากพลาสติก PPSU (สีชา) 

    มีความแข็งแรงทนทานตกไม่แตกไม่ดูดซับสีและกลิ่น 
    ทนความร้อนสูงสุด 180 องศาเซลเซียส
    สามารถนำเข้าเครื่องนึ่งฆ่าเชื้อและเครื่องอบ UV ได้
    อายุการใช้งานสูงสุด 2 ปี


Heart Pin (เข็มรูปหัวใจ) ที่แถมมาในกล่องใช้สำหรับการเจาะรูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานจุกนมเพื่อทำให้อากาศไหลเวียนได้ดียิ่งขึ้น


หมายเหตุ : หากเกิดปัญหาจุกแฟบให้คลายฝาขวดไม่ปิดแน่นจนเกินไปหรือใช้ Heart Pin เจาะที่รูวาล์วระบายอากาศตรงฐานเพิ่มช่วยให้อากาศไหลเวียนดียิ่งขึ้น

list.description:
BONTON+Bétta collaboration bottle
BONTON was founded in May 2001 by the son and daughter-in-law of Mr. and Mrs. Choen who founded Bonpoint. Son Thomas founded BONTON together with his wife Iréne who is a designer. Besides clothing, the BONTON brand includes toys, books, and other products for creating a total lifestyle for children.
Their casual and yet refined and cute designs have won them many fans around the world."The Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle's shape is curved to provide the same ideal feeding angle as with breastfeeding. Devised by American pediatricians and made in Japan, the Doctor Bétta Baby Bottle has been constantly improved with quality materials and an improved nipple. It has received the Kids Design Award and Good Design Award as proof of its quality.
BPA Free. PPSU is the most heat resistant and impact resistant type of transparent PLASTIC.
The bottle can withstand temperatures up to 180°C! This outstanding quality makes it a popular material in medical devices. By using such a proven material, we want to provide maximum safety. Bétta has therefore entrusted this material to this end.
A conveniently-sized bottle that can be used for feeding various amounts, from small amounts until weaning hood. The small size makes it easy for use when you have to breastfeed multiple times. The compact size also makes it highly portable.
"Brain nipple" was inspired from the experiences of an actual midwife. It was developed considering the importance of mastication, as well as with a wish for healthy growth for the baby. Once the baby starts sucking it, the secret wavy part stretches out to fit the mouth and tongue! The nipple lets the baby drink while moving their upper and lower jaw, as if they were being breastfed. This [Crosscut] type notch at the tip, which lets the baby squeeze out milk by moving their mouths, allows them to drink on their own pace.

Material
PPSU bottle : Polyphenylsulfone
Cap hood : Polypropylene
Nipple : Silicone

Heatproof temperature
